title: Creeze
text:
Creeze is a laundry service with room pickup and delivery option. The service currently offers wash and iron option for the clothes at a combined rate of ₹ 8 and individual rates of ₹ 5 and ₹ 4 per cloth respectively. Clothes are usually delivered within 3 days.
The pickup can be scheduled via a phone call at (+91) 9593092034. They had a referral program.
